channel.title: Comments on: Web Hooks in Gmail Would Be Great

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/08/19/web-hooks-in-gmail-would-be-great/#comment-3000">A'braham Barakhyahu</a>.
mailhooks.com looks interesting, might give that a try.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to A’braham Barakhyahu.

mailhooks.com looks interesting, might give that a try.

item.title: By: A'braham Barakhyahu
item.dc:creator: A'braham Barakhyahu
item.description: forwarding selected mail to an email created with mailhooks.com might be the next best thing to gmail having webhooks out of the box. How would you use webhooks in gmail?
item.content:encoded: forwarding selected mail to an email created with mailhooks.com might be the next best thing to gmail having webhooks out of the box. How would you use webhooks in gmail?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/08/19/web-hooks-in-gmail-would-be-great/#comment-2998">Utahcon</a>.
Just so happens that someone has already written a plugin to allows you to add web hooks to the WordPress filters and actions. Looks very cool - http://mitcho.com/blog/projects/hookpress-webhooks-for-wordpress/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Utahcon.

Just so happens that someone has already written a plugin to allows you to add web hooks to the WordPress filters and actions. Looks very cool – http://mitcho.com/blog/projects/hookpress-webhooks-for-wordpress/

item.title: By: Utahcon
item.dc:creator: Utahcon
item.description: Any chance we can expect to see webhook support in WP in the near future? Actually I have never looked, but does WP already support webhooks?
item.content:encoded: Any chance we can expect to see webhook support in WP in the near future? Actually I have never looked, but does WP already support webhooks?
